inn1.comm: short of a good length on the off, pushed off the back foot to extra cover
floating it on middle, gets across to work it towards the leg side
pushed off the front foot into the off side
angling on the pads, tries to flick that square but can't connect, is struck on the pads
short of a good length, nipped back in this time, defended solidly off the back foot
Pakistan open their account, thanks to a wide, pretty wide this time and it's called by the umpire
bowled on a good length this time, gets forward and defends it confidently into the off side
pitched up and it's driven back to the bowler, who fields and stares at the batsman, an extended stare
ooh, some inswing there for Shafiul, almost yorker length on the pads, Jamshed flicks it but unconvincingly, goes through his pads, all the way to the boundary, a very quick outfield
goodish length on the off, rocks forward and defends
pitched up on middle, driven firmly but straight to mid-on
short of a good length on middle and off, presses it away off the back foot
slightly short on leg stump, tries to move across to whip it fine, strikes him on the thigh
flicked away, bowled on a length on the pads, clipped it towards square leg on the bounce
swinging away, gets to the keeper on the second bounce, HAfeez chases it, looking to drive it through the off side, but misses
angling in towards middle, pushes it solidly towards mid-on from the crease
bowled it on a driving length outside off, in the channel, Hafeez is not tempted to drive however, allows it through to the keeper
on a driving length again, shoulders arms to allow it through, almost identical delivery to the previous one
shortish on the off, whipped past midwicket for a single
shortish outside off, guided down towards third man for a single
lovely whip off the pads, straying in line, easy pickings, clipped away through midwicket with a flick of the wrists
goodish length on middle and off, pushes it towards mid-on from the crease
back of a length on middle and off, knocked away into the off side off the back foot
short of a good length, crunched into the ground and towards point where NAsir Hussain fields it well
on a good length, just outside off stump, stabs it towards extra cover
a touch too straight, worked through square leg, wide of fine leg, for a couple of runs
hitting a good length, just around off stump, defended towards point off the front foot
in the channel outside off stump, moving off the pitch, leaving the right-hander, left alone
goodish length and it's struck straight towards Shakib, who fields well at extra cover, stretching to his left
bowled on a good length, opens the face slightly and guides it down to third man
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and punches it to the bowler
shortish on leg stump, tries to whip it square but is struck on the thigh, they get a leg-bye
nicely bowled., short of a good length outside off, moving away and Jamshed tries to open the face on that one, misses
fired in on a good length on the off, defended with a closed face towards midwicket
excellent fielding by Nasir Hossain, punched off the back foot to his left and he hurls himself to clinch it one-handed and save a few runs
pushed it off the back foot towards point
short of a good length on the off, knocks it down off the back foot towards cover, good over
shortish on the off, pushed away into the off side on the back foot
shortish on the off, punched off the back foot to extra cover
just works it wide of midwicket for a quick single this time
slower one, short of a good length, turned slightly uppishly into the leg side towards short midwicket
well fielded again, Jamshed walked down the pitch to that one, took it off a length and drove it uppishly, Tamim did well, diving to his right and keeping them to a single
bowled it short on middle, rolls his wrists over that one, a short fine in place and he gets it past that man for a boundary
short of a good length, knocks it down towards cover from the crease
a slower ball bowled full on the pads, flicked through square leg for a single
nicely timed, he plays that shot well does Hafeez, shortish outside off and he whips it between mid-on and midwicket, off the meat, minimum effort
short of a good length outside off, crunched it down into the ground and towards point
bowled it full on the off, pushed down the ground towards mid-on
shortish on middle and off, knocks it in front of point for a quick single

run-out attempt, pushed off the back foot to point, Nasir dives to his right, collects and throws it to Mushfiqur, Hafeez dived full stretch and made it back just in time, impressive fielding though, it's been sharp today
too much width from Mashrafe, Hafeez doesn't let it go to waste, cuts it over point for a boundary
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot to turn it to midwicket
just a single, Hafeez would have wanted more, shortish and it's pulled over square leg into the deep, deep square leg runs across and cuts it off, keeping it down to a single
short of a good length on the off, knocks it down towards point
flighted on the off, drives it back to the bowler
was that dropped? Driven hard towards extra cover where Nasir Hossain could not get his hands around it, struck really hard, we need a replay, not sure if it just fell short
driven through the off side towards long-off for a single
down the leg side and Mushfiqur misfields as well, a wide called plus the run

appeal for a catch and there's no DRS, Shakib was confident, angling in towards off, Hafeez came down the pitch and decided to defend, not sure if he got an inside edge but it lobbed off the pads towards slip where Mashrafe dived forward
worked into the leg side for a single
beautifully driven but there's a deep cover in place, was pitched up and Hafeez went after it, just the single in the end
yorker, just outside off stump and Jamshed can't get his bat down in time, tried to dig it out but missed
shortish on leg stump, tries to work it off his hips, struck on the thigh, a leg-bye taken
shortish on the off, rocks on the back foot to play it to cover
beaten, shaping away from the right hander, Hafeez pushed at that one loosely but it moved away to just go past the outside edge
short outside off, crunched off the back foot towards point
shortish on middle, turned away through square leg for a single
angling in from round the wicket, pushed off the back foot to extra cover
fullish on the off, reaches forward and plays it back to the bowler
tossed up on the off, played it straight towards extra cover
floating it on the off stump, rocks forward and defends
tossed up outside off, driven towards deep cover for a single
goodish length outside off, gets forward and opens the face to play it wide of point where NAsir dives full length again, just the single
around middle and leg, turned away through midwicket, Razzak runs across in the deep and fumbles, allowing them ample time to come back for the second
back of a length on middle, oversteps, called a no-ball and time for a free hit, mistimes a pull behind square for a single, massive no-ball that
a full toss, an outswinging full toss, Hafeez has a swing at that one and is caught at third man, got a top-edge, just the single in the end
turned through square leg for a single, bowled at 135.2kmph
banged in short on leg stump, played away towards fine leg for one more
plenty of width there, crunched towards deep cover from the crease, just the single
floating it on middle, drives it back towards the bowler
pitched up, struck down the ground to long-on, raises the 50-stand, a steady partnership between these two
angling in towards middle, turned off the front foot to midwicket
bowled it short outside off, kept a little low, cut towards short third, thought of a single but was rightly sent back
flighted on middle, turned away towards deep square leg for a single
that was a full toss and Jamshed paddles it awkwardly towards fine leg for a single
Jamshed made room as Shahadat ran in, short of a good length outside leg stump, tried to open the face, got an inside edge
banged in short, pulled away but there is a deep square leg, just the single
angling in towards middle, got across to flick it square, got it much finer for a single, was right on middle
pitched up outside off, driven handsomely but straight to deep cover for a single
lovely timing, Hafeez is not so much power-play, it's mostly timing with him, short outside off and it's cut with minimum effort past the diving point
guides that one down to third man for a single
gives him the charge, tossed up, converts it into a low full toss and squeezes it past the diving point fielder for four
flighted on middle, gets across and drives it towards midwicket
fires it short on middle, whipped but straight to midwicket
makes a bit of room and the bowler chases him, turned past midwicket into the deep, gently, for a well-run couple
flighted on the off, pushed down the ground to long-off for a single
gets on the back foot and turns it towards square leg
flighted on middle, crunches it down the ground to long-on for a single
Jamshed finding the boundary, had made up his mind, made some room, took it from a length and sliced it between point and short third
quicker through the air, shortish on the off, played back to the bowler
drives it down towards long-on for a single
slightly short on the off stump, moves back and chops it down to point
gets forward and pushes it towards point
flighted on leg stump, comes down the track, gets to the pitch and drills it down to long-on
gives him the charge again, plays it down for long-on for another single
gets on the back foot to flick it towards square leg
a full toss on leg stump, drives it down to long-on for one more, a busy man this over
eased off the front foot down the ground, one more
bowls it flat on the off, pushed back to the bowler from the crease
shortish outside off, cut down towards third man for a single
Jamshed goes over the top, sensed a chance with a short ball from Mashrafe, came down the track and pulled it hard over midwicket
short of a good length, made room and just dropped it in front of point for a quick single
there is a deep square leg in place, pulled away towards him, not timed all too well but a single is what he'll get
slightly short on leg stump, tried to flick it fine but all he manages in the end is a leg-bye
nicely played, pitched up and it's driven elegantly in front of deep cover for a couple of runs
flighted on middle, flicked towards deep midwicket for a single
tossed up on the off, driven firmly towards extra cover
angling in towards leg stump, paddles it down towards short fine leg

unlucky, almost beat Hafeez through the gate, made some room to play it into the off side, that held its line and he got an thin inside edge as he tried to force it through the off side, two wide of short fine
played into the leg side wide of midwicket for a single
Jamshed ends the bowling Powerplay on a high, dances down the track, takes that off a length and smashes it hard over the long-on boundary, powerfully hit, went a fair distance behind the rope
more runs, pitched up outside off and HAfeez steers it smartly behind short third man for a boundary, the runs continue to flow, Hafeez brings up his half-century and the century stand
tossed up on the off, pushed straight towards extra cover
quicker through the air, short of a good length, Hafeez played inside the line, got a thick edge towards short third
pushed it fuller towards extra cover off the front foot
shortish on middle, turned through square leg for a single
pushed through straight on the off stump, plays it back to the bowler
shortish on middle, turned towards midwicket from the crease
bowled it on a good length on middle, pushes it back towards the bowler
fires it quick, short on leg stump, tries to flick it square, struck on the pads
short outside off, cut down towards short third man
worked away from the crease towards deep square leg for a single
flighted on middle, pushes it back down the pitch
short of a good length on middle, worked through midwicket into the deep for a single
flighted on middle, pushed past the diving bowler towards long-on for a single
goodish length, punched through towards extra cover
short outside off, cut away into the ground and straight to point
whipped through midwicket off the back foot for an easy single
flighted on the off, driven down towards long-off for a single
angling it towards middle , Hafeez gets a stride out and pushes it back to the bowler
comes down the track and mistimes that for a couple in the deep, was aiming over midwicket but deep square leg was the one who cut it off
quicker through the air, bowled it flat on middle, played back to the bowler
gets it over midwicket this time and picks the gap perfectly, short on middle and it's dispatched for an easy boundary, long hop that
angles towards leg stump, pushed through square leg into the deep for a couple of runs, good running from Hafeez, scampered back for the second run
played it gently through to long-off for a single
turned in from outside off, dabbed in front of the bowler
on middle and leg, played to midwicket, JAmshed wants the single, Hafeez sends him back, the throw is to the wrong end
waits for it to turn in and opens the face to dab it wide of short third man for a single
fires it short down the leg side and it's called a wide, quicker one that

ooh, Jamshed slip there after trying to sweep it fine, Mushfiqur didn't gather the ball initially, Jamshed slipped after the ball had been fumbled so had time to gather his bat, which also slipped, and get back.
pushed into the leg side for a single
gets forward and taps it gently towards midwicket
tossed up outside off, driven towards long-off for a single, takes him to 49
fires that down the leg side, Hafeez goes for the sweep, may have brushed the pad ont he way to the keeper, not given a wide, Mushfiqur appealed
Hafeez made a bit of room there and Razzak held it back, Hafeez was left to defend it back to the bowler
punched towards long-on off the back foot for a single
a gentle push to long-on fetches him his fifth half-century, it's his first international game in a long time and it's a good comeback
floated it on middle, reaches forward and plays it back to the bowler
takes it from outside off stump, pushes it towards long-on for a single

run-out chance missed, Hafeez tapped it to short third and was late in responding to a call for a single from Jamshed, the throw from short third from Shakib was wide, had it been on target Hafeez was gone, Mahmudullah was not standing close enough to the stumps to gather that throw quickly either
mistimes a pull for a single into the leg side
full outside off, it's sliced through point, Shahadat covers a fair distance, running to his left and diving to keep them down to a couple
played into the leg side in front of midwicket for a quick single, Jamshed well in this time
takes it from the off stump and flicks it square on the leg side for a single
gets a thick outside edge there as he pushed at it inside the line, went to short third

miscue, a complete miscue from Jamshed, came down the track, Razzak held back the length, Jamshed tried to whack it over long-off, it ended up landing safe behind point and in front of the fielder running in from the deep
Hafeez timing it well still, short outside off, made a bit of room, waited for it to turn away, cut it smartly past point for a boundary
gets a big stride out this time and defends in the off side

run-out, a strong throw from Shakib at point as Hafeez played it towards him, Jamshed called for the single, the throw was a little wide but Mushfiqur gathered and took down the bails just in time, Jamshed is short of the crease
short ball first up, cut away straight to point
pitched up outside off, driven straight towards extra cover
short ball on middle, pulled towards deep square leg all along the ground for a single
short of a good length on the off, punched hard towards mid-on, no single on offer there
Nasi Hossain is again sharp at point, saves a single sliding to his left, Younis still stuck on nought
off the mark now, cut down towards deep point for a single
short of a good length, slower one that, chopped wide of a diving point for a single
flighted on middle, drives it down towards long-on for a single
short of a good length on middle and off, bowled it flat, pushed it back to the bowler
forced it off the front foot towards long-off for a single
struck on the pads as he made room to whip it square
tossed up on middle, swept hard but straight to deep square leg for a single
short on the off, punched towards long-off off the back foot for a single
pitched up, driven into the ground and over the bowler's head, mid-on and mid-off are up, just the single
angling in towards the off stump, held its line, bowled at 132kmph, defended solidly towards cover
flicked it from middle towards fine leg for a single, angling in
Younis gets a good amount of bat on it, though it wasn't superbly timed, short outside off and he dragged it high over midwicket, the outfield is quick enough to go past the ropes
a touch too straight, flicked away through square leg into the deep for a single
pitched up, caressed through the covers but into the deep just for one run, there is a deep cover in place
flighted on middle, drives it towards long-on for a single
flighted again, Younis reached forward and drove it back to the bowler
gets a thick inside edge as he reaches forward again, just a single
bowled it short on middle, whipped towards deep midwicket for an easy single
floating in towards middle, played towards long-off for a single
Younis gets a leading edge, that was flighted outside leg stump and he closed the face too early on that one, a single
bowled it full on middle and leg, flicked away uppishly into the deep wide of midwicket for a couple of runs
on a good length on middle, pushed down the ground to long-on for a single
a quick single, pushed it wide of the bowler towards mid-off and ran through to the other end
banged in short outside off, drags it past midwicket into the deep for a single

gone, Younis has to go, Shahadat sends him back, Younis moved way too across to that good length ball on middle and tried to flick it square but closed the face too early, Razzak standing at point judged it well
banged in short on middle, an attempted bouncer, a touch too high, the batsmen isn't troubled, called a wide
angling it on the pads, tries to tickle it fine, clips the pads on the way to the keeper
quicker through the air, bowled it on middle, turned through square leg for a single
tossed up on middle, reverse-paddles it towards short third man
short on the off, punched off the back foot towards extra cover
drops it short towards point
pushed off the back foot through midwicket for a single
gets front and across and taps it gently in front of square leg
Umar gets a boundary to third man, walked forward and opened the face but it went finer than he would have initially intended
slower one bowled on a good length, played it behind point for a single
angling it on the pads, wants to flick it through square but is struck on the pads, wants a leg-bye till but Umar isn't game for it

Shahadat picks up his second wicket this spell, Pakistan have lost two quickly, a short ball on middle, came on to Hafeez quicker than he would have liked, got a top edge and Shafiul took a dolly at square leg
short of a good length outside off, runs it down to third man for a single
another single, gets on the back foot and runs it to third man
angling in towards middle, gets a big stride out and plays it back
lobs off the pads and lands in front of the keeper
driven off the front foot towards long-off for a single
gets front and across and drops it into the leg side
worked away wide of midwicket for a single, just two off the first over of the last Powerplay
angling in towards middle, gets front and across and works it towards midwicket
slower one bowled on a good length, crunched through towards deep extra cover for a couple of runs

The short ball works again for Shahadat, Pakistan losing their way here, banged in short and Asad goes hard at it, went for the hook but couldn't connect well, holed out to deep square leg where Mashrafe ran across a little and judged it well
driven hard wide of deep cover for a couple of runs
slower offcutter, tried to run it behind point, missed
Umar looking to score, shuffles across and picks that over square leg when the intended area was short fine, just the single
reaches forward and plays it towards cover
comes down the track and pushes it firmly towards cover, a fumble allows them a single
flighted outside off, driven towards long-off for a single
closes the face on that one and turns it square for a single
Misbah gets forward and blocks that straight ball into the leg side
short on the off, punched towards long-off for a single to keep strike
short of a good length outside off, guided towards third man for a single
slower one, lands on a length and Umar went after it but didn't pick the change in pace, missed
banged in short and Umar connects well, pulling it wide of deep square leg for a couple of runs, a fumble in the deep allowing them to finish the second
this one has been dispatched, short again and he shapes up for the pull and then smashes it over midwicket
slower one bowled short on the off, knocks it down in front of point for a single
yorker length outside off, dug out in front of extra cover, Shakib runs in but fails to collect that cleanly
short ball outside off, makes room and cuts but straight to point
punched off the back foot towards long-off for a single

Shakib has bowled superbly this Powerplay, Umar, keen to take advantage of the field pulled in, went for the slog-sweep, got a top-edge and Razzak, running back from square leg, juggled once but kept his calm to snap it on the second attempt
angling in towards the off stump, tries to defend, rolls in front of the off stump
punched off the back foot down to long-on for a single

Is he gone? Shakib is claiming the catch, Afridi just struck it back loosely towards the bowler. Did it carry cleanly, did he drop it before taking it on the second attempt? That's what the umpires are checking. Wow. He missed it on the first attempt and got a hand to it just as it was dying down on the second; he palmed it towards Misbah, the ball ricocheted off Misbah and landed safely in Shakib's hand on the third attempt. Big wicket, the slide continues and Bangladesh, you would say, have edged ahead here.
pushed that one down the ground to long-on for a single
short of a good length outside off, chopped it down towards point
pushed it full outside off, drives it towards deep cover for a single
short of a good length, punched down the pitch for a single wide of the bowler
pushed off the back foot through cover for a single
back of a length, chops it down towards point from the crease
steps forward and drives it through cover for a single

Cleaned him up, that went on straight, what a collapse! Misbah was fooled by the straighter one and he played outside the line waiting for the turn, was stuck on the crease, landed on middle and off and bowled him through the gate, seven down now
went on with the arm again, turned it through square leg for a single
gets front and across and plays it through square leg for one more
kept really low, would have missed leg, struck Gul on the pads as he moved back
short, rocks back to punch it straight to extra cover
good length outside off, opens the face to play it through point for a single
back of a length on the off, rocks back and knocks it down on the pitch
lovely shot, bowled it full, in fact it was a full toss on middle, flicked it away through square leg for a boundary
nicely done again, got across and just chipped it over midwicket for a couple more runs
banged it short outside off, leaves it through to the keeper
pushed it through point, a misfield, gets a quick single
shortish on the off, punched hard off the back foot
they get a leg-bye as he tries to nudge it into the leg side
gets forward and taps it towards point, thinks of a single but it's not there
pushed off the back foot to long-on for a single
dropped it softly into the leg side in front of square leg for a single
bowls that full on the off, drives it straight towards cover off the front foot
short of a good length outside off, knocks it down towards point
slower one bowled short outside off, run down behind point, thinks of a second after a fumble but it's not there
slower one, picks it up well, chips that in front of long-on for a single
goodish length outside off, opens the face to play it through point for a single
banged it short outside off, pulled over midwicket, didn't get hold of it, was fortunate it landed safely and that it earned him a couple of runs
strikes him on the pads as he tries to turn the face, would have missed leg
sweeps him hard but straight towards square leg, just the single
shortish on middle and leg, flicked away to deep square leg for a single
flighted on leg stump, gets front and across, strikes him on the pads as he tries to work it away
gets forward and tries to drive it to long-on, can't get it past Shakib
quicker one bowled full outside off, pushed towards deep cover for a single
goodish length, pushed back towards the bowler
full on the off, drives it towards long-on for a single
a leading edge again, full toss, tries to whip it past midwicket, did so very early, got a single as it landed safely behind extra cover
slower one outside off, square-driven through to deep point for a single
banged in short, went for the pull but could not connect
poor ball, he's strong in that area, these are all important runs for Pakistan, full toss on middle and it's swung away to the square-leg boundary
chipped that in front of extra cover, slower one bowled short
angling in towards middle, pushed towards long-on for a single
Umar Gul's doing well here, short ball bowled slow and it's slapped over mid-off for a boundary, struck sweetly, important stand this
pulled away, kept a little low, struck towards deep square leg for a single
Sarfraz squeezes that through extra cover for a single in the deep, giving Gul the strike
slower one bowled short, keeps strike with a punch to deep cover
pitched up outside off, a length ball that Gul was looking to send sailing over long-on, didn't get hold, just a single as it rolled in front of the bowler
pitched up on middle, driven towards long-on for a single
Gul's playing a crucial knock, short ball, slower one again and he picked it well, smacking it hard over midwicket
horrible delivery, full toss on leg stump, a high full toss and Gul helps it on its way to the fine-leg boundary

Mashrafe is losing it here, Pakistan have gone beyond 250 and these two bring up a half-century stand, another full toss, waist-high and it's pulled away over the deep square leg boundary into the crowd, big six that
the legcutter bowls Umar Gul, nipped away to clip the bails as Gul played inside the line, heads back after an excellent cameo
clipped off the pads for a single into the leg side
makes room and slices that past point, Nasir dives full length to his left in the deep to save the boundary, three more though for Pakistan
slower one bowled short, punched towards deep midwicket for a single
dropped at extra cover by Nazimuddin, short ball and it was smashed towards that fielder but he couldn't hold on
slower one bowled short, pulled it over midwicket but not timed well, just the single, Ajmal wanted the second but was sent back
Ajmal does it smartly, walks across and paddle-sweeps that over the short fine fielder for a boundary, Pakistan have achieved a competitive score here

inn2.comm: tossed up from round the wicket, pushed towards Misbah at extra cover, no run there
taps that towards cover off the front foot
gets forward and defends it into the off side
lands on a good length on the off, rocks forward and defends it towards cover
short and wide, goes for the cut but misses, played away from his body there
nipped in from a good length outside off, defended slightly outside the line and got an inside edge onto his pads
short of a good length on middle, bowled at 135.9kmph, gets on the back foot and defends it on the pitch
drops it short on the off stump, rocks back and defends it in front of cover
goodish length on the off, tries to drive it towards cover, gets an inside edge onto the pads and it rolls down into the leg side, Tamim calls and steals a quick single
tossed up on middle, gets forward and drives it back to the bowler
turns in from a good length, gets forward and drops it into the leg side
gets back and works it towards deep square leg for a single
angling in towards middle, gets back and defends into the leg side
gets front and across to that one and knocks it towards midwicket
comes down the track, Hafeez holds back his line and Tamim pads it away, tidy start by Pakistan
short of a length outside off, chops it down towards point, mistimes as he tries to cut
bowled on a good length on the off, pushes it back solidly towards the bowler
good length on middle and this one is struck firmly, driven through the line to mid-on
forces it away this time, pitched on a length on middle and leg and Nazimuddin flicks it uppishly but through the vacant square-leg region, first boundary for Bangladesh
lots of effort in that ball, lands on a good length on middle, turns it square for a single
good bouncer, banged it short outside off at 137.8kmph, Tamim got out of the way early
gets his left foot out of the way and drives it back to the bowler
slightly short from Hafeez, punched off the back foot down to long-on for a single
short of a length outside off, makes room and cuts it but straight to point
ooh, Tamim steps out of his crease, Hafeez holds it back, plkays it back to the bowler
Tamim off the mark, closes the face on that one and works it past square leg for a single
nicely played, short, waited for it to turn in and punched it off the back foot through cover, timed it well, four
lands on a good length on the off, driven firmly towards long-off
in the channel outside off stump, steps forward and watches it through to the keeper
shortish on middle, gets back and punches it past midwicket for a boundary, again not much effort involved, just struck it sweetly
goodish length on the off, rocks forward and presents the full face back to Gul
similar shot to the boundary earlier in the over, punched past midwicket for a couple more runs
picks it from outside off, moved across to that and flicked it straight to midwicket
gets on the back foot and turns it behind square for a single
floated it on the off stump, drove it back gently to the bowler
aiming for middle, turns the face to play it past square leg for a single
gets on the back foot and turns that away to midwicket for a single
flighted on middle, closes the face on that one to play it to square leg
gets forward to push that one down towards long-on for a single to keep strike
Nazimuddin walked across there to turn it square, was struck on the pads but that would have gone down leg
pitched up and that's been dispatched, crunches it through point and cover, meaty strike, middled it superbly
angling in, bowled it full on middle at 139.8kmph, driven straight to mid-on this time

superbly struck, that's flicked away for six, there was a deep square leg in place but he was several yards in, bowled it on middle and leg and he picked it up beautifully, it lands on the ropes, that's a six
banged it short on leg stump and Nazimuddin ducks under it easily
lovely drive on the up, positive batting from Nazimuddin, that one landed on a good length and he caressed it through mid-off and extra cover, uppish but safe
Tamim cashes in on some width this time, short outside off, waits for it to turn away and cut it past point
flighted on the off, gets forward and drives it back towards the bowler
angling in towards middle and off, gets across to play it towards midwicket
quicker ball, landed on a length, pushed back to the bowler
gets front and across to turn it square for a single
ooh, took his left foot out of the way there, indicating for a moment that he was aiming to go over the top, ended up playing it straight back to the bowler
tossed up on the off, drives it wide of extra cover for a single
turning in from outside off, gets forward to work it into the leg side
flighted on middle and off, drives it wide of mid-off for a single
bowled it short on middle, gets across to play it in front of leg slip
bowled it flat on the off, gets forward and pushes it towards cover
angling in towards middle, rocks forward and knocks it away into the off side
short of a good length outside off, chops it down over point for a single in the deep
short of a good length on middle, defended solidly back towards the bowler
a miscue, short ball on the hips, tries to turn it square, ends up hitting the top-end of the bat and lobs up in the vacant midwicket region
kept a little low, on a good length and he squeezes that towards extra cover
Nazimuddin goes, short and wide and it's slashed hard, flies off the outside edge and Umar Gul at third man back-pedals and takes it over his head, judged really well a few yards inside the ropes
short of a good length outside off, holds its line and he leaves it alone
slightly short on the off, rocks back and defends it into the leg side
floating it on the off, gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
flighted on the off, gets forward and turns it past midwicket for a single
tossed it up outside off, lands full and drives it straight to extra cover
fires it quick on the off, comes down the track and tries to launch it over mid-on, gets an inside edge onto the pads
flighted on the off, pushed into the off side
a better pick-up from Hafeez at mid on would have tested the batsman who had pushed a length ball in the fielder's direction and set off for the single
width, lots of it, Jahurul gets off the mark by waiting on the delivery and cracking the cut past a helpless point
Cheema shortens the length, gets some bounce, does not give as much width this time, Jahurul blocks on the off side
third man keeps Jahurul to a single, Jahurula again waits for some more time before opening the face extravagantly and running the ball to third man
leading edge off a length ball now rolls towards Afridi at mid off, Boom Boom lets rip with the throw which misses at the non-striker's
had that connected, they might have as well asked for a replacement ball, Jahurul charged down the pitch with tremendous momentum, and had a huge heave, but was beaten by the bounce
full delivery pushed through midwicket
pushed down the ground to long on for one
googly from Afridi, Tamim stays in the crease, allows it to turn away widish outside off, and guides it through point
the flighted one draws him forward, he reaches the pitch and pushes to long off for one more
eased back with the turn to Afridi
turned to square leg off the front foot
another sharp single but Jahurul was in well before the throw came in from extra cover
worked stylishly and firmly off the pad through square leg for a single
testing short ball now, Jahurul does well to bend a knee and get his head out of the way

superbly bowled slower one, delivered without any change in action, Jahurul was early into the push, but still went for the single in front of extra cover, Tamim was out a by a mile had the throw hit, even the dive would not have saved him
tucked off the hip to deep square leg
smack! this wasn't all that short but Jahurul was so quick to get into position and dismiss it between midwicket and mid on with a confident pull, crowd loves that
runs a skiddy length delivery outside off to backward point
pushed in front of midwicket, he wanted the single, but was slow to realise there was none, got back just in time
worked behind square leg for one
leading edge takes the ball along the ground to long off as he looks to work on the leg side
full one defended back to the bowler
well adjusted in the end, it was tossed up on a length, and Tamim was looking to go leg side, it dipped on him, and he immediately stopped his movement forward to glide it to short third man
this is what he was trying to do previous ball, this one was fuller, and Tamim goes down on a knee to slog-sweep for a massive six over deep midwicket
pushed down the ground for a single, supposed to be good cricket if you do this after hitting a four or a six, wonder why
misses as he tries to nudge one going down the leg side, Safraz misses as well
worked with the turn behind square leg
pushes back a quick delivery to the bowler
gets it past the bowler this time but mid on cuts it off to his left
down the track, gets too close to the pitch and line, and awkwardly pushes it through midwicket
straightens from around the stumps, he gets forward and defends
tossed up ball pushed off the front foot to extra cover
the line is on leg, and Tamim nudges it behind square
Tamim gets front and across as Afridi bowls from round the wicket, worked past midwicket for a single
ooh, short of a good length, a touch quicker, chops it towards short third, Jahrul wants the single, Tamim does not
fortunate, gets an under-edge, short outside off, a touch too close to cut, gets it through Sarfraz's legs on the way to the third-man boundary
missed a full toss, was trying to cream it through cover but just missed out
short of a good length, was the googly, pushed into the leg side
sliding on the pads, turned away to short fine leg, no run on offer there
goodish length outside off, gets across to tap it into the leg side, calls for a single but is sent back
hesitation from Jahrul but he eventually commits, turned to square leg
waits for it to turn it and turned past square leg into the deep for a single
pitched on a good length, pushed straight towards extra cover
flighted on the off, driven down towards long-off for a single
short of a good length on middle, turned off the back foot to midwicket
turns the face on that one and gets a single wide of short fine
floating it outside off, rocks back and punches it to extra cover
almost in the blockhole, digs it out towards extra cover
fires it quick on middle, turned away wide of short fine for a couple of runs
Jahrul admonishes himself for that lapse, flighted and he was tempted, bent low and tried to slog-sweep that into the stands, it went on straight, he missed and that crashed into the stumps
quicker ball, moved away to chop it behind point for a single
angled in towards midwicket, rocks back to turn it square for a single
good length on the off, pushed on the up towards mid-off for a single
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and turns it in front of square leg for a single
fired in quick on the off stump, drops it in front of cover, there's no single available
pitched up, that's driven wide of Afridi at mid-on for a single
banged in short outside off, ducks and lets it be
beautifully done, flighted and that was pitched up, driven hard through the covers, into that deep between deep cover and deep point, a welcome boundary
turned it past midwicket for a single to raise the Bangladesh 100

too close to cut, he'd tried doing that off his first ball against Afridi as well, fired in quick from Afridi and that kept low, he was trying to cut that, misjudgement on his part there, he missed and off stump was pegged back
tossed up on the off, looks to push it through the off side, gets a thick inside edge past square leg for a single
floating it outside off, Tamim gets to the pitch and defends towards extra cover
pushes that one down the ground to long-on for a single
bowled on a good length on the off, punched towards extra cover
banged in short on the off, rocks back to tap it into the off side
nicely timed by Tamim, beautifully in fact, it's raced along the quick outfield, gets forward and just works it past midwicket and it's gone all the way
good bouncer, effort ball from Cheema, banged in short on middle and Tamim ducks
slower one bowled on the pads, turned away towards fine leg for a single
short of a good length on the off, stabs it in front of point
slightly short on middle, gets back and knocks it wide of midwicket for a single
tossed up, Shakib squeezes that through to deep cover for a single

a full toss and it's pushed down to long-on for a single to bring up his half-century, he is gesturing towards someone, maybe has something to do with him not being picked earlier for this competition, pointed the bat towards him
chopped it behind point for a couple of runs
drives it down the ground towards long-on for a single
gets forward, that's tossed up on middle, pushed straight to midwicket
slides it on the pads and Shakib tucks it down in the fine-leg region for a couple of runs
drives that on the up wide of long-off for a couple of runs
tossed up outside off, steered towards deep point for one more
on leg stump, that's driven down to long-on for a single
gets front and across, tries to turn it square, gets an inside edge onto the pads
shortish outside off, chops it down towards point
fullish from Afridi, on the off stump, that's dug out back towards the bowler
that's lucky, it's a lightning fast outfield, closed the face on that googly and got a leading edge and Younis Khan at point had no chance to stop that as it sped past him
short outside off, a misfield from Younis as he slides to his right to stop that, fumbles, two more
full on middle, turns it just wide of midwicket for a single
short of a good length, punched down towards long-off for a single
slightly short, runs that one down towards point
short outside off, Shakib slashes hard and gets that down to third man for a single
nicely timed, short of a good lenght and he cut that firmly towards point but straight to the fielder
lovely shot, Gul came round the wicket and bowled it full and Tamim drove it elegantly through extra cover for a boundary, superbly done
slightly short outside off, guided towards point off the front foot
banged it short on middle, turns that one down towards fine leg for a single
short ball, cut away towards third man for a single, another productive over
bowling it on a length on middle, gets a thick inside edge as he tries to force it through the off side, just the single
flighted on the off, pushed it back to the bowler

Tamim goes, another batsman goes trying to cut the ball, Hafeez angles that in from round the wicket, Tamim waited for it and was trying to run it past short third man, gets an inside edge onto the stumps, Pakistan have struck a crucial blow

Bangladesh are sliding now, Mahmudullah goes! Tossed up and he shapes up to play the sweep first ball, missed, it struck him on middle and leg, it did turn down and would have slightly missed leg stump as the replays show. The umpire, however, felt otherwise
the straighter one outside off, played in front of cover, avoids the hat-trick
opens the face on that one to guide it through point for a single
short of a good length outside off, crunched towards point for a single
short of a good length on the off, guided down to third man for a single
gets on the back foot and plays that wide of point for a single
banged in short and Shakib goes for the pull, a touch too high and it's called a wide
short of a good length on leg stump, turned towards fine leg for a single
slightly short on middle, gets back and defends it towards the bowler
well fielded by Umar Akmal at point diving to his right, was cut well by Nasir
short outside off, punched in front of square for a single
hesitation but a run-out averted, chopped towards point, Shakib called for the single but changed his mind quickly and sent his partner back in time
pushed off the back foot to midwicket
driven down the ground to long-on for a single
flighted on the off, driven down the ground to long-off for a single
tossed up on middle, gets across and turns it towards square leg
short of a good length , cut away towards deep point for a single
knocks that one down towards cover for a quick single
back of a length on middle, tries to punch it past midwicket, gets a slight top-edge but it lands safely in front of the bowler
bowled it short and it's smashed hard towards deep square leg for a single
banged in short outside off, ducks under that
short of a good length outside off, runs it down to third man for a single
lovely drive from Nasir, struck sweetly through the line past extra cover into the deep for a couple of runs
flighted on middle, pushed down to long-on for a single
short outside off, was the googly, Shakib withdrew at the last moment from the cut
turned away into the leg side off the back foot for a single
short on middle, gets back to punch it in the direction of midwicket
driven hard towards deep cover for a single to keep strike, time for drinks
pushes a tossed up ball to the right of Hafeez, who cannot stop the ball cleanly
skiddy one just outside off stump, pushed to sweeper cover
wants the single as he pushes to cover, is sent back in time
worked down to long on with the turn
this one comes in with the angle from around the stumps, he was going back for the cut and instead dropped it close to the wicket in the end
width for the cut, but he crashes it straight to Akmal at backward point, who did well to get to his right to stop the ball
well done, just a soft push on the leg side and off they go across for the single
flighted one on leg stump turned wide of short fine
quickish delivery dropped on the leg side for one
half an appeal for leg before, the ball pitched half a mile outside leg stump
beats him on the cut with a skiddy length ball that zips across outside off
punches a length ball off the back foot to long on
drives a full one off a thick edge wide of cover
rolls off the pads on the leg side, keeper gets to it
quicker one turns down the leg side, neat take by Sarfraz
works through square leg but he will get only one, asking rate almost seven now
tries to hit his way to some runs but mistimes the stroke to extra cover
cannot get this one away as well, can only push it back to the bowler, excellent over
pushed away on the off side
he is hurried into the pull and ends up awkwardly hitting it high in the air, but it is in the gap, and deep square runs around to field it on a couple of bounces

clatter! nothing awkward about this pull, the short ball has been fetched from outside off and dispatched through midwicket with as authoritative a pull as you will get, brings up the first boundary in 55 balls
Cheema's response is a slower one, but it is wide enough to be guided wide of third man, who slips as he bends to collect the ball and concedes the second run
makes him defend a back of a length ball angled in, runs forward to field and threatens to throw it back at the batsman, Nasir stands calmly, unbothered
oh Shakib, that's just lovely, makes some room outside leg as he sees the flight on this one, gets back leg out of the way, and strokes it past a diving extra cover, superb to watch
dabbed to short third man for one, the throw is decidedly wayward
another quick run, it is keeping the crowd in good spirits, all the running
oh Shakib, that is lovelier, dances down the track, one leg in the air as he lifts this one elegantly straight down the ground, it is stopped just inside the rope by a sliding long on
leaves the crease again, Ajmal shortens the length, Shakib forces it down wide of long off
nippy fullish delivery pushed towards extra cover
goes for the yorker, does not get it quite full, Nasir opens his stance to bunt it down to long on
Shakib continues to keep Bangladesh alive and kicking, he steps out, makes some room outside leg, creates some width, and slashes over backward point, fetch that
sharp single, direct hit needed from mid off, not happening, Shakib lives on
slower loopy delivery squeezed out to short third man, that asking rate remains under control for the moment
he slogs, he stays in his crease and has a go, does not look pretty, is mistimed too, and fetches him a single to midwicket
fires it on a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and turns it to short fine
good counter-attack, this, Ajmal strays in line, down the leg side with a short-fine in place, Shakib just helps it on its way to the boundary
slightly short, punched off the back foot towards cover
shortish on the off, punched towards point off the back foot, they decide against the single
shortish on middle, stabbed it towards deep midwicket for a single
tossed up on the off, pushed towards mid-off, scampers a quick single, down to the last 10 overs now
knocked away into the leg side past midwicket for a single
shortish on the off, drops it in front of cover for another one
shortish outside off, chopped down towards deep point for a single
goodish length outside off, plays it behind point for a quick single
struck well but there is a deep cover in place, tossed up there, raises the 200 for Bangladesh
the googly, chopped wide of point and races through for a quick single
fired in on middle and Shakib pulls it hard through midwicket, Shafiq runs across, cuts it off and keeps them down to two
slower one bowled on a length on middle, turned towards midwicket off the front foot
tries to force that good-length delivery through the off side, gets a thick outside edge to third man
wild swing, that was the slower one and he was aiming to go miles over midwicket, missed it
short of a good length, goes for the pull but mistimes it, towards Misbah at midwicket
a full toss on middle, pushed it wide of midwicket for a single to keep strike
that's six, clean strike over the deep midwicket boundary, Ajmal pitches that up, was in the slot for Nasir and he hammered that clean into the stands
now picks a single, gets on the back foot and works it behind square
slower through the air, short outside off, spins away, punches that straight to extra cover
tickles that into the leg side for a single to bring up his half-century, excellent innings under pressure by the former captain
appeal for lbw, came round the wicket, may have been missing leg, spun in and probably would have gone down leg as he came forward to defend
driven inside out wide of long-off and Nasir runs back to the danger end to make it just in time, was a good throw from the deep but Ajmal couldn't collect it cleanly
that's four, a thick edge as he tried to cut that towards point, short and wide and it sped off the outside edge to the third-man boundary, Bangladesh are inching closer
four more, Nasir's playing a delightful innings here, smartly done, short on middle and he just rolls his wrists over it and places it between fine leg and deep square leg,  excellent timing

bowled'im! Gul has fought back by castling Nasir, was fired in towards middle and leg, Nasir moved across and tried to close the face on that one, was probably done in for pace there, ricocheted off the pads onto the stumps
quick single, stabbed it into the leg side wide of midwicket for a quick single, Shakib was the one who called and made it in time
ooh, that was a touch risky, on the stumps, almost middle and off and Shakib still managed to squeeze it towards third man
Gul errs in line, bowls a wide down the leg side
edged, squared him up there with a short of a good length ball on middle, opens the face and somehow manages to get that to third man to keep strike
Razzak has thrown it away, that was a mindless slog, tossed up on middle from round the wicket, took his left leg out of the way and tried to thrash it over deep midwicket, missed and was bowled
appeal for lbw, that struck him in line but seemed to pitch outside leg, it did, was the doosra, can't give those out
played in front of point, Shakib calls and completes the single in time
short and it's struck hard, straight to point, Shakib thought he missed out there
fired in quick, shuffles and drops it in the leg side for another quick single

bowled'im, another one goes, bowled by the doosra! Shakib is being left stranded, the crowd is stunned into silence, tossed up and Mashrafe's eyes lit up, landed on middle and spun the other way, he was looking to hit that through the line but missed, it knocked back off
was the slower one bowled full, driven firmly wide of long-off for a couple of runs
slower one again, the offcutter, drops it in front of cover and takea a single
ooh, was aiming for the inswinging yorker, it surely swung in, got an inside edge as he tried to play it away, just the single
swings at that full toss, gets a leading edge as he tries to go over midwicket, a single down to third man

can't keep that inswinging yorker out, superb ball from Gul, that looked out to the naked eye, swung in and Shafiul was caught on the toe, would have gone on to hit middle and leg as the replay confirms, Shafiul was too late in bringing his bat down, he has to go back
and he does, pitched up outside off, steered towards point
Shakib fights on, there is a short third and a point in place and Shakib picks the gap perfectly, full and wide and it's squeezed between those two
shortish on the off, defended off the back foot into the off side
flighted on the off, rocks forward and defends it
floating it on middle, plays it gently back down the pitch
picks a single, working it away towards deep square leg
negotiates it well, big cheers from thw crowd, gets a big stride out and defends it into the leg side
ooh, that was bowled on a length on leg stump and he swings it towards deep square leg, regrets taking the single, Shahadat is on strike now
full toss on middle, Shahadat knocks it straight to midwicket
short of a good length, goes through, tried to punch it off the back foot, could not connect
almost a yorker but not quite, Shahadat kept it out somehow, some bat and some pad, rolls over into the off side, another dot
yorker again, keeps it out with a little more confidence this time, drops it into the leg side, he needs to see off one more ball
goodish length, defended off the back foot past the bowler, doesn't take the single, Shakib has the strike for the next over

bowled'im! Pakistan have won, Gul came over the wicket, bowled it on a good length and he swung mightily at that one, had no choice, got an inside edge onto the pads and then onto the stumps. The umpires want a replay to check if that was a no-ball, it wasn't.
